Package MOBLIMA

Class ShowSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • MOBLIMA.ShowSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MOBLIMASystem
    public class ShowSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements MOBLIMASystem
    Represents a controller system which keeps track of the shows.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS1 Group 2

    • Field Detail

      • showList

        private java.util.ArrayList<Show> showList
        An array list of the shows.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShowSystem

        public ShowSystem()
        Constructor for the system. It attempts to deserialize the database file. If file does not exist, it will reset the database.

    • Method Detail

      • selectShow

        public Show selectShow​(java.util.ArrayList<Show> array)
        Selector tool of shows in a given show array list. Prints a list of shows, and user will have to select a show using its index as printed.
        Parameters:
        array - the array list
        Returns:
        show if it exists, else null

      • getShow

        public Show getShow​(int i)
        Gets a show given its index in the database (index starts from 1).
        Parameters:
        i - index in the database
        Returns:
        the show corresponding to that index in the database

      • listShow

        public void listShow()
        Lists all the shows in the database. Listing is sorted by movie, then by date, then by time. Golden suite shows will be yellow in colour.

      • listShow

        public void listShow​(java.util.ArrayList<Show> array)
        Lists all the shows from an array list of shows. Listing is sorted by movie, then by date, then by time. Golden suite shows will be yellow in colour.
        Parameters:
        array - array of shows to be displated

      • getShow

        public Show getShow​(Movie m,
                    Cineplex c,
                    java.util.Date d)
        Get a show from the show database given the movie, cineplex and date.
        Parameters:
        m - the movie
        c - the cineplex
        d - the date
        Returns:
        the corresponding show

      • queryShow

        public java.util.ArrayList<Show> queryShow​(Movie m,
                                           Cineplex c,
                                           java.util.Date d)
        Search for shows in the database based on movie, cineplex and date.
        Parameters:
        m - the movie
        c - the cineplex (can be null)
        d - the date (can be null)
        Returns:
        an array list of shows matching the criteria

      • queryShow

        public java.util.ArrayList<Show> queryShow​(java.util.ArrayList<Show> input,
                                           Movie movie)
        Search for shows from an array list based on movie.
        Parameters:
        input - the array list of shows
        movie - the movie
        Returns:
        an array list of shows matching the criteria

      • queryShow

        public java.util.ArrayList<Show> queryShow​(Movie movie,
                                           Cineplex cineplex,
                                           java.util.Date datetime,
                                           boolean hasTime)
        Search for shows in the database based on movie, cineplex, date and whether time is to be considered..
        Parameters:
        movie - the movie (can be null)
        cineplex - the cineplex (can be null)
        datetime - the datetime (can be null)
        hasTime - whether time is to be considered
        Returns:
        an array list of shows matching the criteria

      • addShow

        public boolean addShow​(Cineplex cineplex,
                       CinemaHall cinemaHall,
                       java.util.Date date,
                       Movie movie)
        Add a show to the show list.
        Parameters:
        cineplex - cineplex of the show
        cinemaHall - cinema hall of the show
        date - datetime of the show
        movie - movie of the show
        Returns:
        whether the addition is successful

      • deleteShow

        public boolean deleteShow​(int index)
        Delete a show from the show list, given its index in the database (index starts from 0).
        Parameters:
        index - index in the database
        Returns:
        whether the deletion is successful

      • updateMovieStatus

        public boolean updateMovieStatus​(Movie movie)
        Update the status of movie upon changes in shows. If the movie is coming soon and there is show in the database, the movie status will be set to now showing. If the movie is now showing or preview but no more shows, then the movie status will be set to end of showing.
        Parameters:
        movie - the movie to be updated
        Returns:
        whether update is successful

      • serialize

        public boolean serialize()
        Attempts to serialize the array list into a database file.
        Specified by:
        serialize in interface MOBLIMASystem
        Returns:
        whether serialization is successful

      • deserialize

        public boolean deserialize()
        Attempts to deserialize the database file into an array list of movies.
        Specified by:
        deserialize in interface MOBLIMASystem
        Returns:
        whether deserialization is successful

      • resetDatabase

        public boolean resetDatabase()
        Resets the movie database. It is preloaded with 3 shows for every movie at 3 different dates (1, 2 and 3 December 2019).
        Specified by:
        resetDatabase in interface MOBLIMASystem
        Returns:
        whether resetting the database is successful

      • getNumberOfShows

        public int getNumberOfShows()
        Gets the number of shows.
        Returns:
        number of shows

      • checkDuplicate

        public Show checkDuplicate​(Cineplex cineplex,
                           CinemaHall cinemaHall,
                           Movie movie,
                           java.util.Date datetime)
        Checks whether there is a duplicate show in the show list. If there is, it returns the duplicate show. If not, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        cineplex - cineplex of the show
        cinemaHall - cinema hall of the show
        movie - movie of the show
        datetime - datetime of the show
        Returns:
        the duplicated show if there is, else it returns null

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex​(Show show)
        Get the index of the show in the show database.
        Parameters:
        show - the show to be searched for
        Returns:
        the index of the show in the show database

      • addShow

        public boolean addShow​(Show show)
        Adds a show into the database.
        Parameters:
        show - the show to be added
        Returns:
        whether the show is successfully added into the database

      • removeMovie

        public boolean removeMovie​(Movie movie)
        Removes all shows with associated movie into the database.
        Parameters:
        movie - the movie to be added
        Returns:
        whether deletion is successful
